𓊠 𓂝 𓏏 𓆛 cod fish

𓆛 cod vs 󳺢 carp 𓈰 #Kha

𒄩 KU₆ 𒆒 kad4 𒄫 «cod» fish

𒄩 KU₆ cod kaːtn @ Benyadu "fish"

𒄞 GUD <> 𒄞𒄩 GU₄ku₆ carp #eštub #arsuppu

𒄩 KU kɔ̌s cod 魚 GU YU ⻥

𒅈𒁍 ᶜar-sup-pu carp

𒄷 < 𒄩 < 𒄫 < 𒆒 < 𒅋 Karpfen cod 𒆓 KAD5

IL 𒅋> > 𒅍 IL2 > 𒀧 IL > 𒀠 AL Aal > 𒀦 KAD3 cod

𒀦 KAD3 cod < 𒀠 AL Aal

cod < *kuddô PIE *gewt- (“pouch, sack”) ⇔ perch fish
